languages.text: "Вероятно, сама природа ее задания — и того, чем на самом деле занимается Ксавьер в Просторе — была такова, что он предпочел похоронить эту тайну вместе с Танакией..." {n}Савант осекается.{/n} "Функциональные данные указывают, что основным специалистом по пыткам в свите являешься ты, дознаватель ван Калокс. Все это время я думала, что дознание Танакии проводил лично ты. И одна из причин того, что я уничтожила блок с персональными данными — то, чтобы излишняя сентиментальность не помешала мне мыслить рационально, когда я вновь встречусь с тобой или иными слугами Калькасара".

"The nature of her mission — and of Xavier's true purpose here in the Expanse — was likely why he chose to bury this secret, and Tanakia along with it..." {n}Emelina breaks off.{/n} "The operational data indicates that you are the retinue's primary torture specialist, Interrogator van Calox. All this time, I thought you were the one who conducted Tanakia's interrogation. And one of the reasons why I destroyed my personal data block was to ensure that my own sentiments would not prevent me from thinking rationally when I next encountered you or Calcazar's other servants."
languages.original_text: "Вероятно, сама природа ее задания — и того, чем на самом деле занимается Ксавьер в Просторе — была такова, что он предпочел похоронить эту тайну вместе с Танакией..." {n}Савант осекается.{/n} "Функциональные данные указывают, что основным специалистом по пыткам в свите являешься ты, дознаватель ван Калокс. Все это время я думала, что дознание Танакии проводил лично ты. И одна из причин того, что я уничтожила блок с персональными данными — то, чтобы излишняя сентиментальность не помешала мне мыслить рационально, когда я вновь встречусь с тобой или иными слугами Калькасара".

All this time, I thought you were the one who conducted Tanakia's interrogation. And one of the reasons why I destroyed my personal data block was to ensure that my own sentiments would not prevent me from thinking rationally when I next encountered you or Calcazar's other servants."

languages.text: “塔娜基娅接受的任务，以及希维尔在科罗努斯扩区真正的目的……或许正是由于这个原因，希维尔才打算彻底埋葬这个秘密，连同塔娜基娅一起灭口……”{n}艾米莉娜断断续续地说着。{/n}“任务数据显示，在所有的随行人员之中，你是最主要的审讯专家，冯·卡洛克斯审讯官。一直以来，我都以为负责审讯塔娜基娅的人是你。我之所以会销毁我个人的数据模块，其中一个原因，就是为了确保下次再遇到你，或遇到卡尔卡扎的其他仆人时，我的情绪不会妨碍我冷静思考。”
languages.original_text: "The nature of her mission — and of Xavier's true purpose here in the Expanse — was likely why he chose to bury this secret, and Tanakia along with it..." {n}Emelina breaks off.{/n} "The operational data indicates that you are the retinue's primary torture specialist, Interrogator van Calox. All this time, I thought you were the one who conducted Tanakia's interrogation. And one of the reasons why I destroyed my personal data block was to ensure that my own sentiments would not prevent me from thinking rationally when I next encountered you or Calcazar's other servants."

traits.locale_text: “塔娜基娅接受的任务，以及希维尔在科罗努斯扩区真正的目的……或许正是由于这个原因，希维尔才打算彻底埋葬这个秘密，连同塔娜基娅一起灭口……”{n}艾米莉娜断断续续地说着。{/n}“任务数据显示，在所有的随行人员之中，你是最主要的审讯专家，冯·卡洛克斯审讯官。一直以来，我都以为负责审讯塔娜基娅的人是你。我之所以会销毁我个人的数据模块，其中一个原因，就是为了确保下次再遇到你，或遇到卡尔卡扎的其他仆人时，我的情绪不会妨碍我冷静思考。”
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina

languages.text: «El objetivo de su misión y el verdadero propósito de Xavier en la Extensión es, con toda probabilidad, el motivo por el que decidió enterrar ese secreto, y a Tanakia con él...». {n}Emelina deja la frase en el aire.{/n} «Los datos operativos indican que usted es el especialista principal en torturas, interrogador van Calox. Durante todo este tiempo, pensé que había sido usted quien llevó a cabo la interrogación de Tanakia. Y uno de los motivos por los que destruí mi bloque de datos personales fue para asegurarme de que mis propios sentimientos no me impidieran pensar con claridad la próxima vez que me encontrara con usted u otro de los sirvientes de Calcazar».
languages.original_text: "The nature of her mission — and of Xavier's true purpose here in the Expanse — was likely why he chose to bury this secret, and Tanakia along with it..." {n}Emelina breaks off.{/n} "The operational data indicates that you are the retinue's primary torture specialist, Interrogator van Calox. All this time, I thought you were the one who conducted Tanakia's interrogation. And one of the reasons why I destroyed my personal data block was to ensure that my own sentiments would not prevent me from thinking rationally when I next encountered you or Calcazar's other servants."

traits.locale_text: «El objetivo de su misión y el verdadero propósito de Xavier en la Extensión es, con toda probabilidad, el motivo por el que decidió enterrar ese secreto, y a Tanakia con él...». {n}Emelina deja la frase en el aire.{/n} «Los datos operativos indican que usted es el especialista principal en torturas, interrogador van Calox. Durante todo este tiempo, pensé que había sido usted quien llevó a cabo la interrogación de Tanakia. Y uno de los motivos por los que destruí mi bloque de datos personales fue para asegurarme de que mis propios sentimientos no me impidieran pensar con claridad la próxima vez que me encontrara con usted u otro de los sirvientes de Calcazar».
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina

languages.text: 「彼女の使命の性質、そしてこのエクスパンスにおけるザビエルの真の目的こそ、彼がこの秘密を、そしてタナキアも一緒に葬ることを選んだ理由である可能性があります…」{n}エメリナは言葉を止める。{/n}「作戦データは、あなたの従者であり主任拷問専門家、インテロゲイター・ヴァン・カロックスであることを示しています。私はずっと、タナキアの尋問を行ったのはあなただと思っていました。そして、私が個人データブロックを破棄した理由の一つは、次にあなたやカルカサルの他の使用人に出会ったとき、私自身の感情が合理的な思考を妨げないようにするためでした」
languages.original_text: "The nature of her mission — and of Xavier's true purpose here in the Expanse — was likely why he chose to bury this secret, and Tanakia along with it..." {n}Emelina breaks off.{/n} "The operational data indicates that you are the retinue's primary torture specialist, Interrogator van Calox. All this time, I thought you were the one who conducted Tanakia's interrogation. And one of the reasons why I destroyed my personal data block was to ensure that my own sentiments would not prevent me from thinking rationally when I next encountered you or Calcazar's other servants."

traits.locale_text: 「彼女の使命の性質、そしてこのエクスパンスにおけるザビエルの真の目的こそ、彼がこの秘密を、そしてタナキアも一緒に葬ることを選んだ理由である可能性があります…」{n}エメリナは言葉を止める。{/n}「作戦データは、あなたの従者であり主任拷問専門家、インテロゲイター・ヴァン・カロックスであることを示しています。私はずっと、タナキアの尋問を行ったのはあなただと思っていました。そして、私が個人データブロックを破棄した理由の一つは、次にあなたやカルカサルの他の使用人に出会ったとき、私自身の感情が合理的な思考を妨げないようにするためでした」
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina

languages.text: « La nature de la mission de Tanakia et le véritable objectif de Xavier dans les Étendues sont probablement les raisons pour lesquelles il a décidé d'enterrer ce secret, et Tanakia avec... » {n}Emelina s'interrompt.{/n} « Les données opérationnelles indiquent que vous êtes le principal spécialiste en torture de l'unité, interrogateur van Calox. Pendant tout ce temps, j'ai pensé que c'était vous qui aviez mené l'interrogatoire de Tanakia. Si j'ai détruit mon bloc de données personnelles, c'était aussi pour empêcher mes sentiments de prendre le pas sur ma raison lors de ma prochaine rencontre avec vous ou les autres serviteurs de Calcazar. »
languages.original_text: "The nature of her mission — and of Xavier's true purpose here in the Expanse — was likely why he chose to bury this secret, and Tanakia along with it..." {n}Emelina breaks off.{/n} "The operational data indicates that you are the retinue's primary torture specialist, Interrogator van Calox. All this time, I thought you were the one who conducted Tanakia's interrogation. And one of the reasons why I destroyed my personal data block was to ensure that my own sentiments would not prevent me from thinking rationally when I next encountered you or Calcazar's other servants."

traits.locale_text: « La nature de la mission de Tanakia et le véritable objectif de Xavier dans les Étendues sont probablement les raisons pour lesquelles il a décidé d'enterrer ce secret, et Tanakia avec... » {n}Emelina s'interrompt.{/n} « Les données opérationnelles indiquent que vous êtes le principal spécialiste en torture de l'unité, interrogateur van Calox. Pendant tout ce temps, j'ai pensé que c'était vous qui aviez mené l'interrogatoire de Tanakia. Si j'ai détruit mon bloc de données personnelles, c'était aussi pour empêcher mes sentiments de prendre le pas sur ma raison lors de ma prochaine rencontre avec vous ou les autres serviteurs de Calcazar. »
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina

languages.text: "Der Inhalt ihrer Mission – und Xaviers eigentliches Ziel hier in der Ausdehnung – sind wahrscheinlich der Grund, warum er dieses Geheimnis begraben wollte – und Tanakia mit ihm ..." {n}Emelina bricht ab.{/n} "Laut Operationsdaten seid Ihr der führende Folterspezialist des Gefolges, Interrogator van Calox. Ich dachte zu dem Zeitpunkt, Ihr hättet Tanakias Verhör durchgeführt. Und einer der Gründe, warum ich meinen persönlichen Datenblick zerstört habe, war die Befürchtung, meine eigenen Gefühle könnten mein rationales Denken beeinflussen, wenn ich Euch oder Calcazars andere Diener wiedersehe."
languages.original_text: "The nature of her mission — and of Xavier's true purpose here in the Expanse — was likely why he chose to bury this secret, and Tanakia along with it..." {n}Emelina breaks off.{/n} "The operational data indicates that you are the retinue's primary torture specialist, Interrogator van Calox. All this time, I thought you were the one who conducted Tanakia's interrogation. And one of the reasons why I destroyed my personal data block was to ensure that my own sentiments would not prevent me from thinking rationally when I next encountered you or Calcazar's other servants."

traits.locale_text: "Der Inhalt ihrer Mission – und Xaviers eigentliches Ziel hier in der Ausdehnung – sind wahrscheinlich der Grund, warum er dieses Geheimnis begraben wollte – und Tanakia mit ihm ..." {n}Emelina bricht ab.{/n} "Laut Operationsdaten seid Ihr der führende Folterspezialist des Gefolges, Interrogator van Calox. Ich dachte zu dem Zeitpunkt, Ihr hättet Tanakias Verhör durchgeführt. Und einer der Gründe, warum ich meinen persönlichen Datenblick zerstört habe, war die Befürchtung, meine eigenen Gefühle könnten mein rationales Denken beeinflussen, wenn ich Euch oder Calcazars andere Diener wiedersehe."
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina

languages.text: "Tanakia'nın görevinin tabiatı ve Xavier'ın Enginlik'teki asıl amacı, hem bu sırrı hem de yanında Tanakia'yı sonsuzluğa gömmeyi seçmesinin sebebi muhtemelen." {n}Emelina birdenbire duruyor.{/n} "Operasyonel veriler, senin maiyetin baş işkence uzmanı olduğunu belirtiyor Sorgucu van Calox. Bunca zamandır Tanakia'nın sorgusunu senin yaptığını düşünüyordum. Kişisel veri blokumu yok etmemin bir diğer sebebi, seninle veya Calcazar'ın diğer hizmetkârlarıyla karşılaştığımda duygularımın mantığımın önüne geçmesini engellemekti."
languages.original_text: "The nature of her mission — and of Xavier's true purpose here in the Expanse — was likely why he chose to bury this secret, and Tanakia along with it..." {n}Emelina breaks off.{/n} "The operational data indicates that you are the retinue's primary torture specialist, Interrogator van Calox. All this time, I thought you were the one who conducted Tanakia's interrogation. And one of the reasons why I destroyed my personal data block was to ensure that my own sentiments would not prevent me from thinking rationally when I next encountered you or Calcazar's other servants."

traits.locale_text: "Tanakia'nın görevinin tabiatı ve Xavier'ın Enginlik'teki asıl amacı, bu sırrı ve yanında Tanakia'yı da sonsuzluğa gömmeyi seçmesinin sebebi muhtemelen." {n}Emelina birdenbire duruyor.{/n} "Operasyonel verilerde senin maiyetin baş işkence uzmanı olduğun belirtiliyor Sorgucu van Calox. Şimdiye dek Tanakia'nın sorgusunu senin gerçekleştirdiğini düşünüyordum. Kişisel veri blokumu yok etmemin sebeplerinden biri de, seninle veya Calcazar'ın diğer hizmetkârlarıyla karşılaştığımda, duygularımın mantığımın önüne geçmesini engellemekti."
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina
